Here is the list of signs in astrology, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries signs excel at taking charge and making decisions.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practical and dependable, Taurus signs are solid choices for everyday tasks.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis shine in fast-paced environments.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Emotionally intelligent and nurturing, Cancers excel at relationships.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are natural performers.
6. Virgo - 5/10 - Meticulous and analytical, Virgos thrive in detail-oriented work.
7. Libra - 4/10 - Diplomatic and social, Libras struggle with decisiveness.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Intuitive and passionate, Scorpions are intense investigators.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians excel at exploring new horizons.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns build strong foundations.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and innovative, Aquarians revolutionize social norms.
12. Pisces - 7/10 - Compassionate and artistic, Pisces excel at creating harmonious environments.
Please note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological profiles.
